10 highest rated Hindi web series to watch on Amazon Prime Video (July 2021)

By
Nishalika Shrivastava
-
Published On: July 7, 2021 | Last Updated: July 7, 2021

Amazon Prime Video offers plenty of entertainment options for you, including some of the best Hindi web series on any OTT platform in India right now. Be it drama, crime, action, thriller, or any other genre that you like, Amazon Prime offers many amazing Hindi web series that can keep you hooked to your TV or smartphones for hours. However, amongst so many choices, which ones should you watch first? Honestly, it can be quite confusing, but don’t fret as here are the 10 highest rated Hindi web series to watch on Amazon Prime Video that boasts interesting plots, impressive performances, and amazing direction.

Read more: Best Disney movies to watch in India (July 2021)

1. Made in Heaven

Weddings are super-fun, but there is so much that goes into making ‘the day’ special, and Made in Heaven shows this and much more. It is one of the highest-rated Amazon Prime Videos web series because of its interesting plot that shows the dark side of the big fat Indian weddings. Tara Khanna and Karan Mehra are the wedding planners, who co-own the agency named Made in Heaven. Along with handling their personal problems, they need to tackle a number of issues that arise while organizing marriages, such as dowry, infidelity, molestation, etc.

Click here to watch

2. Paatal Lok

Next on our list of the highest-rated Hindi web series to watch on Amazon Prime Video is Paatal Lok. This crime thriller revolves around an honest police officer who is in charge of a high profile murder investigation. Things get complicated and his investigation leads him to the dark realms of the underworld, which is referred to as the netherworld or Paatal. The popularity of this Anushka Sharma produced Hindi web series on Amazon Prime Videos can be judged from the fact that it won five Filmfare OTT Awards, including Best Actor (Jaideep Ahlawat), and Best Direction (Avinash Arun and Prosit Roy).

Click here to watch

3. Mirzapur

Mirzapur is an action crime thriller series that has captured the hearts of millions of viewers. This highest rated Hindi web series to watch on Amazon Prime Video is about the power battle between two families. One family is of a rich carpet owner named Akhandanand Tripathi aka Kaleen Bhaiya who rules Mirzapur, while the other is the family of an upstanding lawyer Ramakant Pandit – his two sons challenge Tripathi. An unpleasant incident between the two families marks the beginning of a nasty journey of hate, greed, power, etc. Both the seasons of this popular Hindi web series on Amazon Prime Videos are sure to keep you glued to the screen.

Click here to watch

4. The Family Man

The next highest rated Hindi web series to watch on Amazon Prime Video is Manoj Bajpayee starer The Family Man with an intriguing storyline and brilliant performances. This espionage action thriller is about a competent officer of the National Investigation Agency, who keeps his job a secret from his family. He needs to provide for and protect his family while doing this high risk and high-pressure job with low pay. Both the seasons of this popular Hindi web series on Amazon Prime Video revolve around how the NIA deals with potential terrorist attacks on the nation.

Click here to watch

5. Panchayat

Panchayat is one of the highest rated Hindi web series to watch on Amazon Prime Video with an amazing plot and great performance by the ensemble cast. This comedy-drama shows the journey of an engineering graduate, facing problems in finding a suitable job and hence, starts working as a secretary in the Panchayat office. Set up in a remote village in Uttar Pradesh, the story shows the struggle of the protagonist (Jitendra Kumar) adjusting to village life which is not at all easy and also dealing with villagers who only add to his misery. Watch the popular Hindi web series on Amazon Prime Video to know how he deals with all the challenges life throws at him.

Click here to watch

6. Tandav

Next up on our list of the highest rated Hindi web series to watch on Amazon Prime Video is the political thriller Tandav. The series shows the dark side of Indian politics and to what extent people are willing to go to gain power. Greed, hate, betrayal, deceit and many other sides of the complex nature of human beings are explored in this well-written and executed series. Saif Ali Khan, Dimple Kapadia, Sunil Grover, Kumud Misra, Tigmanshu Dhulia, Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub, Dino Morea and Anup Soni star in vital roles in this popular Hindi web series on Amazon Prime Video.

Click here to watch

7. Breathe

Breathe, another highest rated Hindi web series to watch on Amazon Prime Video, stars R. Madhavan, Amit Sadh, and Sapna Pabbi. This thriller drama series showcases the unadulterated love of parents for their children and their willingness to cross every line to protect them. Not bothered about the consequences that his actions might result in, an affable Danny Mascarenhas (Madhvan) engages in a cat and mouse game with cop Kabir Sawant (Amit Sadh) to protect his son. Kabir is not willing to accept what is obvious and trusts his gut and intelligence to crack the complicated case. Furthermore, you can also binge-watch the dark and gritty season 2 – Breathe: Into the Shadows – starring Abhishek Bachchan, Nithya Menen, and Amit Sadh.

Click here to watch

8. Bandish Bandits

The refreshing romantic drama Bandish Bandits is the next highest rated Hindi web series to watch on Amazon Prime Video. It shows the collaboration of Indian classics with pop music through the main lead characters Radhe – a small-town boy, and Tamanna – a big city girl. Although opposites attract and love blossoms, do they commit to their relationship or succumb to pressure. It explores the professional as well as personal struggles and growth of both these characters as the plot unfolds. Both Ritwik Bhowmik and Shreya Chaudhry impresses in this refreshing, youthful, and popular Hindi web series on Amazon Prime Video that also stars renowned names like Naseeruddin Shah, Atul Kulkarni, Sheeba Chaddha, Rajesh Tailang, and Amit Mistry.

Click here to watch

9. Inside Edge

The next highest rated Hindi web series to watch on Amazon Prime Video is Inside Edge, boasting an interesting storyline and brilliant performances of the ensemble cast. This edgy sports drama shows the game behind the game of cricket. The story revolves around the PowerPlay League (PPL) – a T20 franchise – where conflict, selfishness, money, power, and scandal are the key players. Just like the captivating and pacy plot of season 1, the twists and turns of the subsequent edition of the series also managed to impress viewers. Now, be on the lookout for the release date of season 3 of this popular Hindi web series on Amazon Prime Video.

Click here to watch

10. The Forgotten Army

Last but not least on our list of the highest-rated Hindi web series to watch on Amazon Prime Video is Forgotten Army – Azaadi Ke Liye. Created and directed by Kabir Khan, the series honours the forgotten brave soldiers of the Indian National Army (INA), led by the national hero Subhash Chandra Bose. Set during World War II, the series shows the courage and sacrifice of hundreds of soldiers who marched towards Delhi with the war cry Chalo Dilli to liberate India from the clutches of the British Raj. This popular Hindi web series on Amazon Prime Video will definitely make you value and see freedom and independence in a new light.

Click here to watch
